description: Looking like the former captain of the baseball team as well as the guy we all wished lived next door, blonde haired, brown eyed, tight bodied Bryan has that All-American appeal with a laid back sexuality just begging to break out of that white bread crust!While he started out a bit nervous, performing in front of the camera was a huge fantasy for him. What was a huge fantasy for us was when he turned over on all fours and showed off the creamy, tight jock butt for the very first time.We were only too glad our cameras got to make that dream come true. When you see the size of laid he sprays all over those flat abs - and a good portion of the upholstery, you'll delight in seeing his that dreams weren't the only thing cumming that day.
title: White Bread Willie
